same_relations.text: A 48-h exposure to IFN-gamma also resulted in a decrease of both CCAAT/enhancer-binding alpha and sterol regulatory element binding protein (SREBP-1) expression.

same_relations.head: Interferon gamma
same_relations.label: inhibit
same_relations.text: IFN-gamma treatment of 3T3-L1 adipocytes (48-96 h) resulted in a substantial inhibition of insulin-sensitive glucose uptake.

same_relations.head: Interferon gamma

same_relations.text: These data clearly demonstrate that IFN-gamma treatment results in the development of insulin resistance.

different_relations.head: Interferon gamma
different_relations.label: downregulate
different_relations.text: IFN-gamma treatment resulted in a rapid reduction of both peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor (PPAR) protein and mRNA.

different_relations.head: Interferon gamma
different_relations.label: affects
different_relations.text: Interferon-gamma (IFN-gamma) is known primarily for its roles in immunological responses but also has been shown to affect fat metabolism and adipocyte gene expression
